record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the following members of my staff be granted the privilege of the floor for the remainder of the debate on the Food and Drug Administration Revitalization Act of 2007: Nicky Bassford, David Dorsey, David Noll--and Nancy Hardt, with Senator Bingaman.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I also request unanimous consent, on behalf of one of my staff members, to have the privilege of the floor during discussion on this important bill. That will be David Schmickel.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
